Naruto creates a massive amount of clones, and most of the clones jump up and rain [[shuriken]] down on the opponent. Then, a few clones kick the opponent up where the clones in the air all punch the opponent sending them downwards. Finally, some clones throw two clones at the falling opponent who is kicked twice into the ground.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 4]]'' and ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 5]]'' after performing this technique, Naruto enters his [[Naruto Uzumaki's Jinchūriki Forms#One-Tailed Form|one-tailed form]].
